mapper.select: select id,consignee,sex,phone,detail,label,is_default as isDefault from address_book where user_id=#{id} and is_default ='1'
mapper.update: update address_book set consignee = #{consignee},phone = #{phone},sex=#{sex},detail=#{detail},label=#{label} where id = #{id}
update address_book set is_default = #{isDefault} where id = #{id}
